description:
suds is used by the vmware driver and the dependency has always been pinned to 0.4:

  67e63ba8 (Sateesh Chodapuneedi 2011-03-07 18:10:48 +0530 17) suds==0.4

0.4. was released in September 2010 and there hasn't been a release since. In fact, there has only been 16 commits since then  and none of them look to break the existing API.

If there's no reason to expect the next version to break us, we should unpin. Indeed, we want to know early if upstream does break its API.
title: Unpin suds dependency version

If there's no reason to expect the next version to break us, we should unpin. Indeed, we want to know early if upstream does break its API.

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/22971
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/30197d76fe61bf08207bc57f0f95f010116c109f
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 30197d76fe61bf08207bc57f0f95f010116c109f
Author: Mark McLoughlin <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Feb 26 11:38:43 2013 +0000

    Unpin suds dependency version
    
    Fixes bug #1133247
    
    suds is used by the vmware driver and the dependency has always been
    pinned to 0.4:
    
      67e63ba8 (Sateesh Chodapuneedi 2011-03-07 18:10:48 +0530 17) suds==0.4
    
    0.4 was released in September 2010 and there hasn't been a release
    since. In fact, there has only been 16 commits since then and none of
    them look to break the existing API.
    
    If there's no reason to expect the next version to break us, we should
    unpin. Indeed, we want to know early if upstream does break its API.
    
    Change-Id: Icd2bdd021093293b2e4261a00d063239a3c42ce6
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
